name: Rabbit Beach Hut
description:
Handmade, Reclaimed, Wooden, Bespoke, Stained Glass Windowed, Beach Hut Styled Rabbit/Guinea/Small Pet Hutch.

This Hutch has been handcrafted from reclaimed wood. It has been lovingly designed with spoiling your pet in mind. The roof is fully felted and the stained glass window is handmade. The hutch fully opens at the front to allow cleaning and airing.

This is "one of a kind" design, but other designs and specifications can be made to order.

name: Surfboard Bench
description:
Handmade, Reclaimed, Wooden, Fold-Away, Bespoke, Garden Furniture, Surfboard Bench, OOAK.

This bench has been handcrafted using reclaimed wood. It has been sculpted into the shape of a Surfboard which cleverly folds away when not in use. The supporting leg is hinged and drops down to support the bench when in use. 

It is bespoke and "one of a kind" - Orders can be taken for other shapes and sizes to your specification.
